name: KreisReise
description:
Is this infinite ring heaven or hell---?
Turn round and round, this is a dream.
The outside that we looked once.
Just only for that, it continues turning around.
----Whirl walk----


This game is the Metroidvania action game.
It is 2D map, but, with a characteristic rotary view, the screen scrolls and turns.
You get weapons and actions by exploration, and let's conquer the tower.

Default language is Japanese.
Please download DLC "English version" manually if you want to play an English version.
But it may not be appropriate translation because it is machine translation basically.
